content: irish diamond headband december 2022_ saranewknits on ravelry materials & notions yarn - i love this wool naturals color ivory needles - 4 0 mm or us 6 circular or straight tapestry needle scissors steamer blocking boards 1 gauge & measurements 10 5 sts by 21 row across 2x2 inches in seed stitch finished headband measurements 4 x 19 inches after blocking but before sewing ends together stitch notes cf2 cable front 2 slip 2 sts to cable needle hold cable needle in front k2 sts k2 from cable needle 3rpc right purl cable slip 1 st to cable needle hold cable needle in back k2 p st from cable needle 3lpc left purl cable slip 2 sts to cable needle hold cable needle in front p1 k2 from cable needle 5lpc 5-stitch left purl cable slip 3 sts to cable needle hold cable needle in front k2 slip purl stitch from cable needle to left-hand needle p1 k2 sts from cable needle instructions co 31 sts using the long tail cast on setup row - knit all sts begin chart noting that all rs row are read right-to-left and all ws row are read left-to-right work the chart 4 times total you should end on a ws row written instructions are also included below the chart if this is your preferred working method next row - knit all sts as you bind off leaving a long tail for sewing ends together steam block headband to specified measurements put the two short ends together and use the mattress stitch using the knit stitches from the setup row and bind off row respectively weave in ends enjoy 2 3 written instructions row 1 rs k1 p1 k1 cf2 p5 3rpc p1 3lpc p5 cf2 k1 p1 k1 row 2 ws k1 p1 k1 p4 k5 p2 k1 p1 2 times p1 k5 p4 k1 p1 k1 row 3 k1 p1 k5 p4 3rpc k1 p1 k1 3lpc p4 k5 p1 k1 row 4 k1 p1 k1 p4 k4 p2 k1 p1 3 times p1 k4 p4 k1 p1 k1 row 5 k1 p1 k1 cf2 p3 3rpc k1 p1 2 times k1 3lpc p3 cf2 k1 p1 k1 row 6 k1 p1 k1 p4 k3 p2 k1 p1 4 times p1 k3 p4 k1 p1 k1 row 7 k1 p1 k5 p2 3rpc k1 p1 3 times k1 3lpc p2 k5 p1 k1 row 8 k1 p1 k1 p4 k2 p2 k1 p1 5 times p1 k2 p4 k1 p1 k1 row 9 k1 p1 k1 cf2 p1 3rpc k1 p1 4 times k1 3lpc p1 cf2 k1 p1 k1 row 10 k1 p1 k1 p4 k1 p2 k1 p1 6 times p1 k1 p4 k1 p1 k1 row 11 k1 p1 k5 p1 3lpc p1 k1 4 times p1 3rpc p1 k5 p1 k1 row 12 repeat row 8 row 13 k1 p1 k1 cf2 p2 3lpc p1 k1 3 times p1 3rpc p2 cf2 k1 p1 k1 row 14
